main event: A witness reported seeing a bright red light hovering over Greenville, Ohio, on February 15-16, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 minutes and appeared to move slowly in a vertical motion., The witness described it as very bright and colorful, unlike anything they had seen before., The object was located approximately 35 degrees above the horizon in the west., The observer was located inside their house but could see the object clearly., The conclusion drawn was that the object was the moon, however, the witness disputed this based on their observations.
witness description: the witness observed the object from their house and was familiar with planes, indicating this was not a routine flight.
